substr(b.tuoivao,4,1) in (2,3) or (substr(b.tuoivao,1,3)<2 and substr(b.tuoivao,4,1)=1) then 1 else 0 end) c02,sum(case when (substr(b.tuoivao,1,3)>=2 and substr(b.tuoivao,4,1)=1) or substr(b.tuoivao,4,1)=1)) then 1 else 0 end) c07,sum(case when (a.ttlucrk=7) and (substr(b.tuoivao,1,3)>=2 and substr(b.tuoivao,4,1)=1) or (substr(b.tuoivao,1,3)<1 and substr(b.tuoivao,4,1)=0) then 1
